chains.instruction: Excellent! Now move to Stage 2: Please analyze the requirements and create a detailed implementation plan. End by saying STAGE2_COMPLETE
Perfect! Now move to Stage 3: Begin the actual implementation based on your plan. End by saying STAGE3_COMPLETE
Fantastic! Final stage: Please review your implementation, test it, and provide a summary. End by saying ALL_COMPLETE
